statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')"; model="$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name')"; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ]; then cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && branch=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then git_info=" [$branch]"; else git_info=" [detached]"; fi; changes=$(git status --porcelain 2>/dev/null | wc -l | tr -d ' '); if [ "$changes" -gt 0 ]; then git_info="$git_info *"; fi; else git_info=""; fi; printf "â›° %s | %s%s | %s" "$(whoami)" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_info" "$model"
